Prefixes.kjv_def: in, on, at; with; through; among; when; in exchange for
like, as, similar to, according to, about
to, toward; for; in regard to; of, about
from, of; on account of; beside; above; than; since

Missing Words: need adding into the families/roots array

Missing Words.strongs_def: Almon from 5956; hidden; concealed, a town in Benjamin allotted to the priests, a place in Palestine See also 5963
Sepharvaim, 'the two Sipparas', a city in Syria conquered by the king of Assyria perhaps near the modern 'Mosaib' and on the Euphrates above Babylon
alabaster, from an unused root meaning to bleach, i. e. whiten; white, i. e. marble. See 8336.
Hamath-rabbah, from 2574 and 7237; Chamath of Rabbah; Chamath- Rabbah, probably the same as 2574. enclosure of wrath - populous a town site unknown; maybe same as Hamath
